caption.p: Gross appearance of mice following treatment with LEAM and Cisplatin on DLA-induced solid tumour bearing mice where (A) represents normal mice; (B) DLA-bearing mice; (C), (D), (E) DLA-bearing mice treated with 100, 200, and 500 mg/kg b.wt. of LEAM respectively and (F) represents DLA-bearing mice treated with single dose of Cisplatin after 35Â days of tumour inoculation
